titles.title: A resolution congratulating Iowa native Caitlin Clark on becoming the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I basketball leading scorer.
A resolution congratulating Iowa native Caitlin Clark on becoming the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I basketball leading scorer.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates Caitlin Clark on becoming the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I basketball all-time leading scorer.
